analysis.description:
Xplan.buyRoundDataRecord (/unique_chucks/28/0xa684786cebeaa1a4b5ce5d9c4da5399e5cade930.sol#305-311) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- developerAddr.transfer(_amount.mul(scientists) / 100) (/unique_chucks/28/0xa684786cebeaa1a4b5ce5d9c4da5399e5cade930.sol#310-311)
_dividend in Xplan.getPlayerDividendByStage (/unique_chucks/28/0xa684786cebeaa1a4b5ce5d9c4da5399e5cade930.sol#421) is a local variable never initialiazed
_playerAmount in Xplan.getPlayerDividendByStage (/unique_chucks/28/0xa684786cebeaa1a4b5ce5d9c4da5399e5cade930.sol#423) is a local variable never initialiazed
_dividend in Xplan.getPlayerJackpot (/unique_chucks/28/0xa684786cebeaa1a4b5ce5d9c4da5399e5cade930.sol#542) is a local variable never initialiazed

Xplan.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xa684786cebeaa1a4b5ce5d9c4da5399e5cade930.sol#9)
Xplan.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xa684786cebeaa1a4b5ce5d9c4da5399e5cade930.sol#10-12)
